title: New Offer: 6% Cash Back for First Year
description: Link for teaser title:  https://www.wisebread.com/compare/pxd-2025-may-bofa-customized-cash-rewards-revi... This popular credit card has a new offer, where you can earn 6% cash back for the first year in the category of your choice. (After the first year, you'll earn 3% cash back.) Click here to learn more!
author: webmaster
excerpt: This popular credit card has a new offer, where you can earn 6% cash back for the first year in the category of your choice. (After the first year, you'll earn 3% cash back.) Click here to learn more!
